name: Captain Explosion
description:
Captain Explosion is an action-packed Platform Shooter game that has a unique game-play, in which you use different weapons, explosion jumping and rocket launchers to work your way through different platforming levels - solving puzzles and taking out enemies along the way.

Captain Explosion is a must try game for all fans of Shoot Em Up's, Platformers, Platform Shooters and basically any other game genre!

Music by: 

  • Matthew Pablo (Dream Raid) - http://www.matthewpablo.com
  • Ogrebane (Action Theme Song)
